thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 2 of 478
thread.title: Carol Ann

author: Carol Ann
title: Carol Ann
text: I am happy for the chance to review my purchase. I was delighted to find a size clear bag that fit my A6 notecards nicely. However, the first few bags were ok but after that, the adhesive strip was lower and lower on the bag until it was almost inside the bag. I've only used a few so I can't say how many of them are mistamped. They did appear to improve after a while.
